newsitem.title: UK: NWE naphtha steady on wet side, firmer on paper.
newsitem.headline: NWE naphtha steady on wet side, firmer on paper.

text.p: NWE naphtha was steady to a touch firmer as stronger swaps that were up $1 or so started to pull the wet market higher.
Dealers said demand for full range and good quality N+A persists, but that cargo were not being overly offered.
"Its not a very busy market, but there does not seem to be very much getting offered," said one dealer.
August swaps were talked around $181-182 while physical cargoes were pegged around $175 cif NWE.
